description.narrative: The revised Project Development Objective is to: (1) increase enrollment of children in basic education, with particular attention to gender equity, in 10 governorates; (2) improve quality of teaching in basic education nationally, and (3) establish foundations for improved MoE capacity to carry out its core functions, so as to contribute to the National Basic Education Development Strategy (NBEDS) goals.

condition.narrative: Each FMR to be submitted 45 days after each calendar quarter
Prepare a report for the MTR June 30, 2007
Prepare on s semi-annual basis starting June 30, 2005, a progress report
Review the report on the outcome of the MTR
The Borrower will follow the implementation program, the EMP and the POM
The Borrower will submit the audit report no later than 6 months after the end of FY
The borrower will update the Procurement Plan not less than 12 months after the preceeding PP

Reform policies approved based on National Basic Education Development Strategy (NBEDS)

target.value: GES established; School fee abolished; Tying teaching post to teachers; articulated job description for inspectors; CoMEestablished; Revised MoE structure completed

actual.value: First TA on Revised MOE structure completed

title.narrative: Quality control of comprehensive school survey completed

actual.value: TA by UNESCO was completed and CSS / AES format was modified.

comment.narrative: This activity did not take place due to impossibility to bring international consultants/firms to conduct the work. Other kind oftechnical assistance was provided by UNESCO Cairo to modify the Annual Education Survey, to make it a simplified CSS. MoE is readytouse the simplified CSS format for the next round of data collection.

title.narrative: Approval of modernization policy documents and MOE organigram

actual.value: Document under review before cabinet approval

comment.narrative: The consultancy to finalize the MoE organizational structure reform and modernization at different levels has resumed after thersuspension was lifted, and the consultant has completed the report.
